item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #430】SRE 周刊第 #430 期
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, FireHydrant: We’ve gone all out on our new integration with Microsoft Teams. If you’re a MS Teams user, FireHydrant now supports the most comprehensive integration for incident management. Run the entire IM process without ever leaving the chat. https://firehydrant.com/blog/introducing-a-brand-new-microsoft-teams-integration/ r/sre: Senior SRE looking for a resume review, […]】在 sreweekly.com 上查看 来自我们的赞助商 FireHydrant 的消息：我们已全力以赴与 Microsoft Teams 进行新的集成。如果您是 MS Teams 用户，FireHydrant 现在支持最全面的事件管理集成。无需离开聊天即可运行整个 IM 流程。 https://firehydrant.com/blog/introducing-a-brand-new-microsoft-teams-integration/r/sre：高级 SRE 正在寻找简历审查，[...]
